All Implemented Interfaces:
Cluster
public class DynamicCluster
extends AbstractGroup

A cluster of entities that can dynamically increase or decrease the number of entities.

Constructor Detail

DynamicCluster

public DynamicCluster(java.util.Map properties, Entity parent)
Instantiate a new DynamicCluster. Valid properties are:
  • factory - an {@EntityFactory) (or groovy.lang.Closure) that creates an Entity, typically implementing Startable, taking the java.util.Map of properties from this cluster as an argument. This property is mandatory.
  • initialSize - an java.lang.Integer that is the number of nodes to start when the cluster's start(List) method is called. This property is optional, with a default of 1.
Parameters:
properties - the properties of the cluster (these may be visible to created children by inheritance, but to set properties on children explicitly, use the factory)
parent - the entity that owns this cluster (optional)
